channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: An Introduction to Online Platforms and Their Role in the Digital Transformation
item.description: An Introduction to Online Platforms and Their Role in the Digital Transformation by Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry has an embargo on Monday 13 May 2019 at 9:00 and a launch event planned on Monday 13 May 2019 at 9:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry

item.title: Upgrading the ICT questionnaire items in PISA 2021
item.description: Upgrading the ICT questionnaire items in PISA 2021 by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Monday 13 May 2019 at 11:00.

item.title: Strengthening Active Labour Market Policies in Italy
item.description: Strengthening Active Labour Market Policies in Italy by Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs has an embargo on Wednesday 15 May 2019 at 9:30.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs

item.title: Balancing School Choice and Equity - An International Perspective Based on Pisa
item.description: Balancing School Choice and Equity - An International Perspective Based on Pisa by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Wednesday 15 May 2019 at 11:00 and a launch event planned on Wednesday 15 May 2019 at 11:00.

item.title: Addressing Problematic Opioid Use in OECD Countries
item.description: Addressing Problematic Opioid Use in OECD Countries by Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs has an embargo on Thursday 16 May 2019 at 10:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs

item.title: Improving School Quality in Norway - The New Competence Development Model
item.description: Improving School Quality in Norway - The New Competence Development Model by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Monday 20 May 2019 at 9:00 and a launch event planned on Monday 20 May 2019 at 9:00.

item.title: Measuring Distance to the SDG Targets 2019 - An Assessment of Where OECD Countries Stand
item.description: Measuring Distance to the SDG Targets 2019 - An Assessment of Where OECD Countries Stand by Statistics and Data Directorate has an embargo on Monday 20 May 2019 at 10:30.

item.title: Perspectives économiques de l'OCDE, Volume 2019 Numéro 1 - Version préliminaire
item.description: Perspectives économiques de l'OCDE, Volume 2019 Numéro 1 - Version préliminaire by Economics Department has an embargo on Tuesday 21 May 2019 at 11:00 and a launch event planned on Tuesday 21 May 2019 at 11:00.

item.description: OECD-Wirtschaftsausblick, Ausgabe 2019/1 - Vorläufige Ausgabe by Economics Department has an embargo on Tuesday 21 May 2019 at 11:00 and a launch event planned on Tuesday 21 May 2019 at 11:00.

item.title: OECD Economic Outlook, Volume 2019 Issue 1 - Preliminary version
item.description: OECD Economic Outlook, Volume 2019 Issue 1 - Preliminary version by Economics Department has an embargo on Tuesday 21 May 2019 at 11:00 and a launch event planned on Tuesday 21 May 2019 at 11:00.

item.title: Taxing vehicles, fuels, and road use - Opportunities for improving transport tax practice
item.description: Taxing vehicles, fuels, and road use - Opportunities for improving transport tax practice by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Wednesday 22 May 2019 at 5:00.

item.description: OECD Skills Strategy 2019 - Skills to Shape a Better Future by Centre for Skills has an embargo on Wednesday 22 May 2019 at 10:00 and a launch event planned on Wednesday 22 May 2019 at 10:00.

item.description: Stratégie 2019 de l'OCDE sur les compétences - Des compétences pour construire un avenir meilleur by Centre for Skills has an embargo on Wednesday 22 May 2019 at 10:00 and a launch event planned on Wednesday 22 May 2019 at 10:00.

item.title: ITF Transport Outlook 2019
item.description: ITF Transport Outlook 2019 by International Transport Forum has an embargo on Wednesday 22 May 2019 at 10:00 and a launch event planned on Wednesday 22 May 2019 at 10:00.

item.description: Tax Revenue Implications of Decarbonising Road Transport - Scenarios for Slovenia by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Wednesday 22 May 2019 at 13:00.
